modName: Kiehazzu's Curvaceous Babes V3 (Redone) - With LSAR Conversion
summary: I have completely redone my mod "Kiehazzu's Curvaceous Babes". This version includes a lot of extras and fixes not in the original version. There is still some small clipping issues but I am working on patches to resolve this.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b][u] [/u][/b][/size][size=6][b][u]Kiehazzu's Curvaceous Babes V3 (Redone)[/u][/b][/size][/center]

As some of you know, I created a body mod a while ago called "Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs" to
match the body used in the mods "Arousing Armor II" and "Arousing Attire
II". This body was essentially the CBBE shape with bigger breasts.
However, I wanted the girls of Skyrim to be curvier. Bigger behinds with
smaller hips. I also wanted the breasts to be more rounded. So I have
been working very hard on my own custom body with a vanilla armor and
clothing replacement..... this is the result.

This is a super curvy body replacement for female NPC's based on CBBE. I have also
included conversions for the "Little Sexy Apparel Replacer" by
Cotyounoyume so that vanilla armor will match the bodies.

To replace the dark brotherhood armor and vanilla leather armor (which do not seem to be included in the mod "A little sexy apparel replacer") I have included two conversions of armor mods by Aradia and betterbecause. These armor files do not require the original mods so please take a moment to go to their pages and give them an endorsement. Those guys deserve it, awesome modders.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50133/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?

[b][u][size=4]Required Mods[/size][/u][/b]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

a little sexy apparel replacer with LSAR Addon by Cotyounoyume - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5564/?

HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?

[b][size=4][u]Not Required But Highly Recommended For Best Results[/u][/size][/b]

Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

High Quality Eyes by Xenius - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?

Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by Rops1981 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23755/? (version 2)

1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition by TS - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6276/? (Full Version)
[size=4]
[b][u]Install Instructions[/u][/b][/size]

[size=2]These are instructions for getting a result pictured in the screenshot[/size]s

1) Install Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente

During installation, select the "skinny" option, check the box that says "vanilla shape" and select the "Faces" option

2) Install ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii

3) Install High Quality Eyes by Xenius

4) Install Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by Rops1981

5) Install a little sexy apparel replacer with LSAR Addon by Cotyounoyume

6) Install Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy choosing the "skinny" settings and making sure "Eyes" remains unticked

7) Install HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt

8) Install Kiehazzu's Curvaceous Babes V3 (Redone) by Kiehazzu (This mod, as well as any of the optional files such as the vanilla armor)

9) Install 1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition by TS (Clipping through hips will occur if females have their weapons on their side)
author: Kiehazzu
